process.description:
RapidMiner Extensions requirements:
rmx_ontology = 5.1
rmx_text = 9.3

Python Library:
ontospy:
pip install ontospy

Set the macros used by the scripts:
- inputFile: RDF/OWL/N3/TTL file of the schema to convert
- outputDirectory: Directory where to store the results
- AlloyUtilsFile: .als file with Base OWL/RDFS Definitions
Create the DL Axioms using DL Axioms from OWL
Create the Alloy file using the AlloyGenerator approach
Use as input of the python script instead of the one above for manually updated versions of the axioms
